bugs_found.description: Mobile nav labels used xs:inline class but no xs breakpoint was defined in Tailwind config
Win/lose overlays used absolute positioning without relative parent, causing incorrect positioning
Puzzle 5 (PRIME + PRIME = PRIME) was mathematically impossible to solve

bugs_fixed.fix_description: Added xs breakpoint (375px) to screens configuration
Added relative overflow-hidden classes to Card component
Replaced impossible puzzle with solvable AB + BA = CDC

ux_issues: No visual feedback for wrong moves in Prime Hunt
Mobile nav touch targets too small

ux_improvements.description: Added shake animation and red flash for wrong moves
Improved card hover states with lift effect, shadow, and icon scaling
Always-visible labels, 44px touch targets, better active states
Added logo container with background, improved hover states
Subtle background tint, improved spacing and active states
Gradient background, monospace numbers for visual interest
